snippet: J. R. Smith of the Knicks has again drawn attention from N.B.A. officials after an apparently unsportsmanlike act against a Mavericks player on Sunday.
abstract: New York Knicks player J R Smith again draws negative attention from NBA officials after untying shoelaces of opposing player during victory over the Dallas Mavericks.
lead_paragraph: J. R. Smith of the Knicks has again drawn attention from N.B.A. officials after an apparently unsportsmanlike act against a Mavericks player on Sunday.

headline.main: On-Court Levity Puts J. R. Smith Back on the Defensive
headline.print_headline: On-Court Levity Puts J. R. Smith Back on the Defensive
